name: Keep It Olive (abhimonk)
description:
A game about taking care of a beloved plant.

  

Interact with a relaxing, non-threatening world!

Feed your plant to help it grow! The plant loves you!

Main Programming by Evan Z

Art and Music + Additional Programming by Abhi S

Made for Ludum Dare 46

Listen to the music here!:

https://soundcloud.com/abhisundu/a-lovely-day-to-be-a-plant
